europeana:record.dc:title: Afrocampsis, a new genus belonging to the Sigalphinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae) from the Afrotropical region
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Achterberg, van C.
Quicke D.L.J.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Braconidae; Sigalphinae; Acampsini; Afrocampsis; Afrotropical; key
europeana:record.dc:description: The tribe Acampsini (Braconidae: Sigalphinae) is reported for the first time from the Afrotropical region. The genus Afrocampsis gen. nov., and its type-species: A. griseosetosus spec. nov., are described and fully illustrated. An illustrated key to the Palaearctic and Afrotropical genera of the subfamily Sigalphinae is given.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Afrocampsis, a new genus belonging to the Sigalphinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae) from the Afrotropical region (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 64) (Issue 11)
